```{r}
packages <- c("tidyverse", "haven", "readxl", "car", "knitr")
installed_packages <- packages %in% rownames(installed.packages())
if(any(installed_packages == FALSE)) {
  install.packages(packages[!installed_packages])
}
invisible(lapply(packages, library, character.only = TRUE))
```

```{r}
pse_refugees <- read.csv("C:/Users/gmfor/OneDrive - brynmawr.edu/Spring 2025/Data Science Feminism/PSE_test/hdx_hapi_refugees_pse.csv")
```


```{r}
#df with only total age group, broken up by gender 
pseAll_genSplit <- subset(pse_refugees, age_range == "all") %>%
  mutate_at(vars(population), as.numeric)

pseAll <- subset(pseAll_genSplit, gender == "all")
```

```{r}
#bar plot of the three population types 
ggplot(pseAll, aes(x = population_group, y = population))+
  geom_bar(stat = "identity")

```
